presentation.title: Diabetes Prediction Model
presentation.subtitle: Based on provided parameters this model can provide an evaluation with regards to the patients likelihood to have diabetes.
presentation.help_text: Populate the fields below to make use of the model.

model.name: diabetes_model
model.description: Estimates if a patient has diabetes based on certain parameters.

features.name: Pregnancies
features.description: The number of pregnancies the subject has had.

target.name: Diabetes
target.description: The patient has diabetes by model estimations.
